source.@value:
pipeline "Routing"
stage 0 match either
rule "Route - My First Stream Logs"
rule "Route - Desktop Firewall - MS Logs"
end

pipeline "Training"
stage 0 match either
rule "Route - Training"
stage 75 match either
stage 50 match either
rule "Parse - UTM-KV"
rule "Parse - Apache"
rule "Context - Always True"
end

rule "Route - Desktop Firewall - MS Logs"
when
    from_input(
        name: "MS Logs")
then
    route_to_stream(
        name: "Desktop Firewall Events",
        remove_from_default: true
    );

    set_field(
        field: "route",
        value: "Desktop Firewall - MS Logs"
    );
end

rule "Route - My First Stream Logs"
when
  from_input(
    id : "661047a0a480e766cfcd0edb"
  )
then
  route_to_stream(
    name : "My First Stream",
    remove_from_default : true
  );
end

rule "Route - Training"
when
    has_field("log_pack")
then
    route_to_stream(
        name: "Training Logs"
        );
end

rule "Context - Always True"
when
  true
then
  set_field(
    field : "rule_demo",
    value : "With great power comes great responsibility",
    clean_field : false
  );
end
